description: Handy TypeScript Playground integration within the browser. (Right click to convert TypeScript code on the web and remix it!)
author: Daniel Desira 'http://dand.netne.net'
name: typescript-playground

preferences.name: enableOnAll
preferences.title: Enable on any page
preferences.description: If enabled, context-menu item will also be shown for pages not mentioning TypeScript in URL or title.
